input.sentences: everyone looking normal before the halloween party . that look wont last .
the guests started to arrive in their crazy outfits .
heres dad dressed up as dracula . he put so much effort into it .
i loved that hat my friend wore | i got ta borrow it sometime .

output.sentences: These friends won't settle for a normal party.
They started to call their guests and began putting on their outfits.
The effort everyone here put in to getting dressed was great.
Everyone loved the costume their friends wore.
As soon as everyone arrives the party livens and things become crazy.
